name: The Final Answer
description:
Survive the Quizmaster's sick trivia game, where answering incorrectly can get you killed.

Trivia - Nearly 2000 questions to answer, getting them correct can be the difference between life and death
Survive - There is poison gas constantly eating away at your health. Find antidotes before your tolerance runs out.
Items - Items can be acquired to help you survive this cruel game.
Game modes - There are multiple quiz types and therefore, multiple ways to die
Characters - There are 3 playable characters. If they all die... It's game over.
